page.title: 11Television in Lostock
page.content: There are lots of programmes on T.V. I have several favourite programmes such as{Advanced Dungeons and Dragons}which is about six people transported to another dimension given magical weapons and who try to escape. I think it is a good cartoon. Another of my favourites is{Street Hawk.}It is about a motor bike which can travel at three hundred miles an hour and has a laser machine gun and missiles. I also like watching cartoons. My favourites are {Road Runner,}a bird which defies Cayote's amazing traps,{Tom and Jerry and{Bugs Bunny.}I don't like soap operas such as{Dynasty}or{Dallas however. Sunday is the worst day for T.V. because in the morning there is{Songs {of Praise,}in the afternoon there are {Political programmes}and in the evening there is{Songs of Praise again
